con:testCase.name: BadCase-MobilcomDebitelService-topUp
con:testCase.con:description: Tests bad-case scenarios for mobilcom-debitel interface for service topup based on specification in SVN: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\Mobilcom_Debitel\ST_TD_SR41002_DRC_U-036_MoDe_Interface_Specification_V_1.1.docx ยง 4.2.1

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Fault occurred while processing.</faultstring> <detail> <ns3:topupSynchronousFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/querybalance/mode/" xmlns:ns3="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/topupsynchronous/mode/" xmlns:ns4="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/deductbalance/mode/" xmlns:ns5="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/directrechargeevolutionservice/redeemvoucher/mode/"> <fault> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>No valid data for request</originatorMessage> <errorCode>102</errorCode> <message>topup amount not allowed, amount is smaller or equal 0.</message> </fault> <requestWithoutVoucherCode> <amount>-100</amount> <balanceType>2</balanceType> <msisdn>49150321611</msisdn> <referenceId>cc84eac56ac4479184b8c5472ddea3ac</referenceId> <paymentUseCase>FULL_WITH_SMS</paymentUseCase> <terminalId>60609999</terminalId> <terminalTimestamp>2017-01-12T16:17:35+01:00</terminalTimestamp> <terminalTraceNum>181853283</terminalTraceNum> <serverId>299992</serverId> <processingId>280230</processingId> <partnerId>MO_DE</partnerId> </requestWithoutVoucherCode> </ns3:topupSynchronousFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
